channel.title: Server customization heeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeelp
channel.description:
I need to know a few things about editing servers but heres what i already know:
Spawning Items:type ::pickup (the item id #) (the quantity).
Spawning npcs:type ::npc (the npc id #)
But what i want to know is how to make it so when anyone logs into your server they have a certain lvl in each skill and how to make them start with certain items. How to change the teleports. How to make objects such as runite mining rocks. How to make npcs that DONT die the first time you hit them, How to make different shops all over the moparscape world.
plzzzzzzzzzzzzz help :) ;) :D :mad: :( :eek: :cool: :rolleyes: :P :o :confused: :| ;D

item.title: Server customization heeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeelp
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

for your first question, open player.java and search for

		for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++)

and change the part under it, then for initial items, still in player.java, search for:

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] and change the item id’s for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Server customization heeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeelp
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

I havent done #1 in a while.
How to change tele’s= Client.java. Search for the tele command or the coords. Change them
Runite mining rocks? That’s a case.
Shops- Read tutorials.

Read full topic
